Context:
* Transfer credits will be considered for institutions outside Canada.
* Evaluations can be obtained through undisclosed methods.
* Application process for credential assessment should begin early, providing 2-3 months prior to transfer credit application deadline.
* Education verification from Chinese institutions may be delayed, recommended early start for evaluation process for Spring and Fall applicants.
* Credential evaluations obtained for Citizenship and Immigration Canada are not accepted for transfer credit applications.
* Course outline attachment required for each course applying for assessment as equivalent to a George Brown College course.
* Translation of non-English course outlines needed if not in English.
* Prior Learning and Assessment Recognition (PLAR) considered for courses where no course outline is available.
* All applications for transfer credit must be submitted through Stu-view.
* Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca, Social Media Hub.
* Application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours and more can be signed up for on the website.
